name: Bib + Tuck
overview:
Bib + Tuck is a members-only online marketplace for women to exchange clothing.

Bib + Tuck caters to creative and stylish women who need an alternative to buying new. The website offers a simple process to sell items which involves uploading a stylized picture, pricing, and then shipping it off to the buyer. In return, members receive online currency called “bucks” which they can then use to purchase items themselves. Although Bib + Tuck is not the first site to recognize the need for women to both give and receive fashion pieces, itâ€™s the first to emphasize social transparency, moneyless transactions, and attractive visuals. The site is currently invitation-only.
